here Enteryth Ã¾e Apostyl petyr and johan Ã¾e euangelyst with hym. petyr seyng O ?e pepyl dyspeyryng be glad A gret cause ?e haue and ?e kan se Ã¾e lord of all Ã¾ing of nowth mad is comyng ?our comfort to be All ?our langorys salvyn xal he ?our helthe is more Ã¾an kan wete. jhesus Ffrendys be-holde Ã¾e tyme of mercy The whiche is come now with-owt dowth mannys sowle in blys now xal edyfy and Ã¾e prynce of Ã¾e werd is cast owth. Go to ?on castel Ã¾at standyth ?ow Ageyn sum of myn dyscyplis go forth ?e to Ã¾ere xul ?e ffyndyn bestys tweyn An Asse tyed and here fole Also Vn-losne Ã¾at Asse and brynge it to me pleyn Iff any mas Aske why Ã¾at ?e do so Sey Ã¾at I haue nede to Ã¾is best certeyn and he xal not lett ?ow ?our weys for to go Ã¾at best brynge ?e to me. 1us Apostolus holy prophete we gon oure way we wyl not ?oure wourd de-lay Also sone as Ã¾at we may We xal it brynge to the. here Ã¾ei ffecch Ã¾e Asse with Ã¾e ffole and Ã¾e burgeys seyth Burgensis Herke ?e men who ?aff ?ow leve Thus Ã¾is best ffor to take Away but only ffor pore men to releve this Asse is ordayned as I ?ow say. Philippus Good sere take this At no greff Oure mayster us sent hedyr Ã¾is day he hath grett nede with-owt repreff Ã¾erfore not lett us I Ã¾e pray Ã¾is best for to lede. Burgensis Sethyn Ã¾at it is so? Ã¾at he hath ?ow sent werkyth his wyll and his intent take Ã¾e beste as ?e be bent and evyr wel mote ?e spede. jacobus minor This best is brought ryght now here lo holy prophete At Ã¾in owyn wylle And with Ã¾is cloth Anon Also Ã¾is bestys bak we xal sone hylle. Philippus Now mayst Ã¾ou ryde whedyr Ã¾ou wylt go Thyn holy purpos to ffulfylle thy best fful redy is dyth Ã¾e to bothe meke and tame Ã¾e best is stylle And we be redy Also Iff it be plesynge to Ã¾i ssyght The to helpe A-non forth ryght Vpon Ã¾is best Ã¾at Ã¾ou were dyght Ã¾i jurney ffor to do. here cryst rydyth out of Ã¾e place And he wyl and Petyr and Johan Abydyn stylle And at Ã¾e last whan Ã¾ei haue don Ã¾er prechyng Ã¾ei mete with jhesu, Petrus O ?e pepyl dyspeyryng be glad A grett cawse ?e haue and ?e kan se Ã¾e lord Ã¾at all thynge of nought mad is comynge ?our comforte to be All ?our langoris salvyn xal he ?our helthe is more than ?e kan wete He xal cawse Ã¾e blynde Ã¾at Ã¾ei xal se Ã¾e def to here Ã¾e dome for to speke. Ã¾ei Ã¾at be crokyd he xal cause hem to goo In Ã¾e wey Ã¾at johan baptyst of prophecyed Sweche A leche kam ?ow nevyr non too Wher-fore what he comawndyth loke ?e Applyed Ã¾at som of ?ow be blynd it may not be denyid Ffor hym Ã¾at is ?our makere with ?our gostly ey ?e xal not knowe of his comaundement in ?ow gret necglygens is Aspyed Where-fore def fro gostly heryng clepe ?ow I howe. And some of ?ow may not go ?e be so crokyd For of good werkyng in ?ow is lytyl habundawns Tweyn fete heuery man xuld haue and it were lokyd Wyche xuld bere Ã¾e body gostly most of substawns Ffyrst is to love god Above all other plesawns Ã¾e secunde is to love Ã¾i neybore as Ã¾in owyn persone and yf Ã¾ese tweyn be kepte in perseveraw?s Into Ã¾e celestyal habytacion ?e Arn habyl to gone. Many of ?ow be dome why for ?e wole not redresse Be Mowthe ?our dedys mortal but Ã¾er-in don perdure Of Ã¾e wych but ?e haue contrycyon and ?ow confesse ?e may not in-heryte hevyn Ã¾is I ?ow ensure And of All Ã¾ese maladyes ?e may haue gostly cure For Ã¾e hevynly leche is comyng ?ow for to vicyte And as for payment he wole shewe ?ow no redrure Ffor with Ã¾e love of ?owre hertys he wole be Aqwhyte. Apostolus johannes On to my brotherys for-seyd rehersall Ã¾at ?e xuld ?eve Ã¾e more veray confydens I come with hym as testymonyall Ffor to conferme and fortefye his sentens Ã¾is lord xal come with-out resystens On to Ã¾e Cety-ward he is now comyng Where-fore dresse ?ow with all dew dylygens To honowre hym as ?our makere and kyng. And to fulfylle Ã¾e prophetys prophese Vp-on An Asse he wole hedyr ryde Shewyng ?ow exawmple of humylyte Devoydyng Ã¾e Abhomynable synne of pryde Whech hath ny conqweryd all Ã¾e werd wyde Grettest cause of All ?our trybulacyon Vse it ho so wole for it is Ã¾e best gyde Ã¾at ?e may haue to Ã¾e place of dampnacyon. Now brothyr in god syth we have intellygens Ã¾at oure lord is ny come to Ã¾is cete To Attend up-on his precyous presens it syttyth to us as semyth me Wherfore to mete whit hym now go we I wold fore no thyng we where to late to Ã¾e cete-ward fast drawyth he me semyth he is ny at Ã¾e gate here spekyth Ã¾e iiij ceteseynys Ã¾e fyrst Ã¾us seyng 1us ciues de jherusalem Neyborys gret joye in oure herte we may make Ã¾at Ã¾is hefly kyng wole vycyte Ã¾is cyte. ijus ciues Yf oure eerly kyng swech a jorne xuld take to don hym honour and worchepe besy xuld we be. iijus ciues Meche more Ã¾an to Ã¾e hevynly kyng bownd Are we Ffor to do Ã¾at xuld be to his persone reuerens. iiij ci[ues] late vs Ã¾an welcome hym with flowrys and brawnchis of Ã¾e tre Ffor he wole take Ã¾at to plesawns becawse of redolens. here Ã¾e iiij ceteseynys makyn hem redy for to mete with oure lord goyng barfot and barelegged and in here shyrtys savyng Ã¾ei xal haue here gownys cast A-bouth theme and qwan Ã¾ei seen oure lorde Ã¾ei xal sprede Ã¾er clothis be-forn hyme and he xal lyth and go Ã¾er upone and Ã¾ei xal falle downe up-on Ã¾er knes alle atonys Ã¾e fyrst Ã¾us seyng ius ciues Now blyssyd he be Ã¾at in oure lordys name to us in Any wyse wole resorte And we be-leve veryly Ã¾at Ã¾ou dost Ã¾e same For be Ã¾i mercy xal spryng mannys comforte. here cryst passyth forth Ã¾er metyth with hym a serteyn of chylderyn with flowrys and cast be-forn hyme and They synggyn Gloria laus and be-forn on seyt Thow sone of davyd Ã¾ou be oure supporte At oure last day whan we xal dye Where-fore we Alle Atonys to Ã¾e exorte Cryeng mercy mercy mercye. Jhesu Ffrendys be-holde Ã¾e tyme of mercy Ã¾e wich is come now with-owtyn dowth Mannys sowle in blysse now xal edyfy And Ã¾e prynce of Ã¾e werd is cast owth As I haue prechyd in placys A-bowth And shewyd experyence to man and wyf In to Ã¾is werd goddys sone hath sowth Ffor veray loue man to revyfe. The trewthe of trewthis xal now be tryede and A perfyth of corde be-twyx god and man Wich trewth xal nevyr be dyvide Confusyon on to Ã¾e fynd sathan. ius pauper homo Ã¾ou sone of davyd on vs haue mercye As we must stedfast be-levyn in Ã¾e Ã¾i goodnesse lord lete us be nye Whech lyth blynd here and may not se. ijus pauper homo Lord lete Ã¾i mercy to us be sewre and restore to us oure bodyly syth We know Ã¾ou may us wel recure With Ã¾e lest poynt of Ã¾i gret myth. Jhesu ?owre be-leve hath mad ?ou for to se And delyveryd ?ou fro All mortal peyn blyssyd be All Ã¾o Ã¾at be-leve on me And se me not with here bodyly eyn. here Cryst blyssyth here eyn and Ã¾ei may se Ã¾e fryst seyng ius pauper homo Gromercy lord of Ã¾i gret grace I Ã¾at was blynd now may se. ijus pauper homo Here I for-sake al my trespace And stedfastly wyl be-levyn on Ã¾e.
